Test Input: Technology advances. Innovations grow. Ideas evolve.
actualOutput:
Technology advances, driving Innovations forward at an unprecedented rate, while Ideas continue to evolve, reshaping the way we live and work.

Technology keeps pushing boundaries, fostering new Innovations that push society forward. As Ideas mature, they become increasingly influential in shaping our future.

The relentless march of technology leads to constant Innovations, while the process of evolving ideas drives progress and change on a global scale.
